A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not as as well written as the previous one. {Spoilers} The plans made by the Resistance were all built up then later fails and needed ass-pulls and \"Deus ex machina\" moments to save their situtions. Kylo and Rey's relationship have an awkward turn that didn't seem natural. Fight scenes weren't great. It wasn't a terrible movie but it isn't that good either. 2 and a half out of 5
